string-array.name: homeData
string-array.item: To light a candle is to cast a shadow…
Unclose your mind. You are not a prisoner. You are a bird in fight, searching the skies for dreams.
It is the hour of pearl—the interval between day and night when time stops and examines itself.
I continued, as was my wont, to smile in his face, and he did not perceive that my smile now was at the thought of his immolation.
Why is it that when one man builds a wall, the next man immediately needs to know what\'s on the other side?
Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
What\'s the bravest thing you ever did? He spat in the road a bloody phlegm. Getting up this morning, he said.
I wish that there was nothing to hold me here, that gravity was a suggestion I could ignore.
Each of us has only a quantum of compassion. That if we lavish our concern on every stray cat, we never get to the centre of things.
The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a dead channel.
Strange is the night where black stars rise, and strange moons circle through the skies, but stranger still is lost Carcosa.
Then his head sank to the floor of its own accord and from his nostrils came the last faint flicker of his breath.
